I posted the first thrilling installment of my report on Katsura,
Saigo and Okubo in both the group files and on the ShiinsengumiHQ
website in the "Facts" section.

Note to Philalexandros--- the Seagraves (whose book I got the info
from) appear to be Saigo fans though I refuse to think or refer to him
as a gentle bear of a man. _They_ site his greatest flaw as "sincerity".

Go figure

Barb Sheridan
